data.heading: About me
paragraphs: In second year of my college I started working my first startup Gangs Of Hackspur. While building up the product I learned Full stack Web Dev, SEO and Web analytics.
From then, I have learned UI/UX Designing, Data Science and currently working in ML and AI environment. Improving day-by-day just to became an skilled Entrepreneur.
In my free time I love reading business, design and self-improvement books that help me shape my life. Watching movies or brainstorming the solution to problems I had recently.
